biotools.summary: ER-CoV is a framework backed by Artificial Intelligence (AI) that uses simple blood exams to help to perform COVID-19 screening in Emergency Rooms (ER). The focus or ER-CoV is to determine which patients are likely to be negative for the coronavirus, such that more specific exams can be prioritized for those deemed as likely positive.
